title: How to get internet service at home for free - Quora

response.answer_text: You can’t. You need at least some sort of modem, or some sort of Wi-Fi network adapter. You might be able to set up Wi-Fi-as-WAN service via an antenna and a nearby public hotspot spending $30–40, but that involves a financial transaction. Come to think of it, so does receiving FM signals, unless you already have an FM radio. You’ll be missed. Or, you could always try to move your home to the location where you wrote this question from.
